description: The Bike Zero Cushion Print Crew socks put cycling front and center—literally, with a pattern that’s all about the bike. They offer numerous comfort features, including a Virtually Seamless toe, breathable mesh zones, and a performance-oriented fit, as well as Shred Shield and Indestructawool technologies for durability. Plus, they’re made with ZQ-certified Merino wool, so you can enjoy natural temperature regulation and odor resistance as you crank out mile after mile in the sport that you love.
name: Smartwool Bike Zero Cushion Wolf Print Crew Socks - Mens

specs.value: 48% Merino Wool, 15% Nylon, 31% Recycled Nylon, 4% Elastane, 2% Polyester
